code: export function fixed(num){var count=Number(num).toFixed(2);var countfix=Number(num).toFixed(0);var len=countfix.toString();if(len.length>6&&len.length<10){count=countfix/1e6;count=Number(count).toFixed(2);count=count+'m';}if(len.length>9){count=countfix/1e9;count=Number(count).toFixed(2);count=count+'b';}return count;}
